string-array.item: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS index_syntagms_synset1id_word1id ON syntagms(synset1id,word1id); CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS index_syntagms_synset2id_word2id ON syntagms(synset2id,word2id);
DROP INDEX IF EXISTS index_syntagms_synset1id_word1id; DROP INDEX IF EXISTS index_syntagms_synset2id_word2id;
ALTER TABLE domains ADD COLUMN domain varchar(32); UPDATE domains SET domain = SUBSTR(domainname, INSTR(domainname, \'.\')+1);
CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS samplesets AS SELECT synsetid, GROUP_CONCAT(samples.sample, \'|\' ) AS sampleset FROM samples GROUP BY synsetid;
